name: Alex Spencer Reserve - The Mansa San Andres Robusto
additionalNotes: The Alex Spencer Reserve cigar was released under the brand name “The Mansa” named after the African King Mansa Musa. Known for his generosity as well as his wealth, Musa was just one of many black historical figures that Spencer’s late father Floyd introduced to him as role models when Alex was a child growing up in Cincinnati’s Westwood neighborhood.
